Dartkafe/Windlornd: Darkafte approached with a dish of energon soup 
in his hand (t was obviously that it was more water than energon). 
He rudely hit the door with his other hand and after few seconds he 
opened the door
Organics:  The femme slowly woke up thenlooked up and saw Dakfate 
standing in the doorway.  "Could you be a little more rude?  I was 
trying to sleep."
Darkfate:"I'm so sorry"replied cooly the male"But you only have 20 
cycles to feed your boyfriend and your visit ends... You wished 
watch that all was ok with him, we give you your wish now time it's 
almost over"
Organics:  The femme takes the soup from the Minion and shakes 
Windlord gently to wake him up.  "Hey, you need to get up and eat 
somehing, come on," she said.
Darkfate/Windlord: Darkate retired and closed the door. Windlord 
tried to sit down and that effort was enought to tired him a lot. 
His arms was heavies and he could left them to take the dish and 
spoon. He low his head and said "I never had feel so humiliated"
Organics:  "Don't worry, it won't last long.  We get out of this."  
She held th male as he fed himself, a little sad with the situation.
Windlord did a big esfort to fed himself, he was a little depressed: 
Organics and he was in a big trouble and he was defendless and 
Organics was in the same base that a mad-bot .
Organics:  The femme rested her head on the male's shoulder, 
thinking, thinking of a way to get out of this mess.
Windlord: Windlord took weakly her hands and said "Are you worry my 
love?"
Organics:  "Yes... I don' know what to do.  If I try to buy Malice 
some time, Unicron will kill us.  And if I find Malice, He will get 
killed.  What am i supposed to do?"
WIndlord: windlord lie down, he was tired. He tought a second and 
said "Do you know something, Organics?"said weakly the 
male"Sometimes, sacrifies are needed and more in war..." he stooped 
a while as he was thinking carefully what would he said
Organics:  "But I miss him, I found him jus to lose him again.  I 
won't let him die!  I want ouir family to be reunited, even just for 
a few minutes."
Windlord: "Then..."said the male"You have to save you..."
Organics:  "No, I'm going to save US, you're a par of the family, 
Boyfriend..."
Windlord: "I'm not in contidtions to scape"said sadly the male while 
he weakly took her hands "I'm you stopping you... I love you, 
Organics, but If we remain here both will be lost... You have your 
brothers... and they are watting you.."
Organics:  The femme roughly squeezed the male's shoulders.  "Don't 
talk like that!  We're going to get out of here.  Even if I have o 
carry you all the way back to base."
Windlord/Darkfate: Windlord smiled weakly and was almost ready to 
said something when Darkfate appeared and snarled "TIME OVER! "
Organics:  The femme visciouslly snarled back.  "Watch it!  I may 
end up killing you if you don't stop being such a moron.  You'd 
better watch yourself."
Darkfate: "You should be carefully what you said"snarled back the 
male and looking significatly to Windlord added"You have a lot to 
loose"
Organics:  The femme suddenly jumped up and grabbed Darkfate by the 
neck and lefted him off the ground.  "And you'll lose it all if you 
aren't too careful!"  She was mad now, really mad.
Unicron/Darkfate: "Can anyone explain me what means this 
mess!"commanded Unicron's hologram and looking to Organics , 
added"Organics... Free him"
Organics:  The femme growled then threw Darkfate out into the 
hall.  "Tell him to stop being a jerk."
Uncron: "You should get the custom, Organics"said with some irony"We 
aren't maximals, so we can't behave as one"
[Organics:  "Adopt a few of them.  Or else you will be short one 
Minion, and hen you'll just have a clone between you and me.  Learn 
some humility."
Unicron: the hologram laughted and said with a slight irony in his 
vioce"I would try.. well I'm not in mood to discuss and I have no 
time to loose... So Organic, be a nice girl and said farewell to 
your Boyfriend... It's time that you come back to your obligations"
